tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CarDesignProject (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(50),
    ideation_date TIMESTAMP,
    design_stage VARCHAR(20),
    production_status VARCHAR(20),
    market_release_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE CarDesignProject (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE DesignTeam (
    team_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    team_lead VARCHAR(255),
    designer_1 VARCHAR(255),
    designer_2 VARCHAR(255),
    designer_3 VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY(project_id) REFERENCES CarDesignProject(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CarDesignProject (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    designer_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ProductionTimeline (
    timeline_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT REFERENCES CarDesignProject(project_id),
    phase_name VARCHAR(100),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE CarDesignProject (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(100),
  project_description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  completion_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE PartsInventory (
    part_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    part_name VARCHAR(100),
    part_category VARCHAR(50),
    part_supplier VARCHAR(50),
    quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE AssemblyLine (
    assembly_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    line_name VARCHAR(100),
    line_description TEXT,
    capacity INT,
    start_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE CarMarketRelease (
    car_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    model_name VARCHAR(100),
    release_date DATE,
    market_reception TEXT,
    sales_performance INT
);
